location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Morley, East India Company Resident at Bushire, and his assistant, George Green, to Henry Moore, East India Company Agent at Bussora [Basra]

mods.abstract: The letter gives an update on affairs in Bushire, including Sheik Nassir's [Sheikh Nāsir] proposed alliance with the Sheikhs of Grain, the desertion of some of Meer Mahanna's [Mīr Muhanna] men at Bunderick [Bandar Rig], a company of sepoys left at Bushire by Captain Nilson, and the transfer of a large amount of stock from Bushire to Basra.
